Posts.Content:
When you go to read her obituary, it directs you to www.mem.com. I hope each of you can go there and watch what they call the movie of her life. It's a slide show of beautfiul pictures of Shells from when she was a baby throughout her life.
While thinking of Shells this week, I have been praying for Keith and Kalia. Shells was about
 the age of my children -- much too young to leave behind a young daughter. She left behind a beautiful legacy for Kalia. May she know what a strong woman her mother was.
Sadly,
Becky
Posts.Title: Sad News!

Posts.Content:
Thinking of you and dh today, MK. Give us an update when you can. 
Sending hugs your way,
Becky
Posts.Title: DH finally has a diagnosis.

Posts.Content:
Mary K., you and Chuck continue to be on my prayer list. May the Lord comfort you during this most difficult time.
Sending hugs and love,
Becky
Posts.Title: Hospice will be helping me now.

Posts.Content:
Thanks for the update, Joyce. I've kept checking here to see if there's any news. Like you, I'm sorry it's not better. I am so thankful, though, that you are in contact with her daughter. Will keep praying for our dear Cathi.
I'm also sorry to hear that your lungs are not clear. Take care of you, too. Sounds like Vic has his hands full. 
{{{Joyce & Vic}}}
Becky
Posts.Title: Cathi

Posts.Content:
Well, Bev, I kept George busy the month of June acting as my nurse while I was battling cellulitis. Things are looking better now. The infection is gone, but I'm still wearing an Unna boot to help the remaining redness go away on the front of my leg. He's outside mowing the front yard, so I'll tell him you asked about
 him when he comes back in. Know he loves you, too! Glad to know we'll be hearing more from you here.
Love ya,
Becky
Posts.Title: At MK's request for help...
HOSPICE

Posts.Content:
Bless your heart, MK. What a week you have had! So glad you have good help. Still praying here in VA.
Love,
Becky
Posts.Title: This has been the craziest week of my life.

Posts.Content:
Hope you're having a wonderful visit with your family, MK. Fly on over VA and wave at me!
Love & Hugs,
Becky
Posts.Title: I've been trying to connect and report in

Posts.Content: My heart is breaking. Thank you, Joyce, for letting us know.
Posts.Title: Cathi

Posts.Content:
Bev, welcome as new co-moderator and thank you for accepting MK's invitation to help. Hope you heal quickly. I know that bandages can be a pain!
Becky
Posts.Title: At MK's request for help...

Posts.Content: Checking in to let you know that I miss you, too, and I'm so glad you're feeling better.  I miss our Literati nights.  What fun we had trying (and failing) to dethrone the Scrabble Queen!  Poor Libby is still having trouble getting online, so we don't even IM any more -- just a phone call once in a while.  She's doing well, and we'd love to hear from some of our old friends, too.  I hope we see some familiar names posting. Glad they're working to regulate your blood sugar.  We want you to feel well and enjoy watching those birds.  Keep taking care of you, MK.  You're loved!
Posts.Title: What's been up with me lately.

Posts.Content:
Happy Birthday, Kitty. If you're like me, birthdays don't have to be limited to one day! Hope you're finding a way to stay warm, and enjoy that birthday cake!
Hugs,
Becky
Posts.Title: Happy Birthday, Kitty

Posts.Content: We may be leading busy lives, but we ALWAYS have time to wish our dear friend a Happy Birthday!
Posts.Title: HAPPY BIRTHDAY, MK
MK Called from Hospital

Posts.Content:
Congratulations, Ellen!  One of the things I've always liked best about
 our board is marking important milestones with our breast friends.
Posts.Title: 4 years ago!

Posts.Content: Happy Birthday, Cathi.  I hope you made a big wish when you blew out the candles on your cheesecake and that it's already come true!
Posts.Title: Happy Birthday Cathi!

Posts.Content:
You guys are so sweet. Thank you! Bev, you know we don't get anything extravagant for birthdays; but I did get a Kodak all-in-one printer that we're trying to install. Want to come help us?!
Lauri, I know your mom was glad to celebrate her birthday with you. Look at all of those trips you've taken making wonderful memories. The most special memories would be of seeing her great-grandbabies. Hope you have lots of pictures for her to enjoy.
MK, one of my favorite b'day memories is the time you and Chuck called and sang a duet of "Happy Birthday!" I'm so glad you're home from the hospital. Now rest and feel better.
Joyce, Geo will never, ever forget you! Even if you don't have lemons hanging around your neck!! Give that Vic a hug for me.
Ladies, you are so special. I love you all. 
Becky
Posts.Title: Happy Birthday, Becky!

Posts.Content: It's never too late to celebrate a birthday!  Thank you all so much.  I am so blessed, and my breast friends are one of life's true blessings.
Posts.Title: Happy Birthday Beck2000... the best thing about January...
Prayers needed please............

Posts.Content: Happy Belated Birthday, Gail!  Hope the celebration is still going strong.  Are the candles still burning?
Posts.Title: HAPPY BIRTHDAY (GAIL, POSTAL2)

Posts.Content:
{{{MK}}} You're right -- breathe. Worse than being diagnosed with bc is having a loved one diagnosed. You can be assured that I will be praying for her. Is this Carolyn? I'm so thankful that Jo-Ann is there. The Lord knew you would need some in-person hugs and sent Ms. J-A to help you out. Hang in there, my friend. We're with you.
L&H, 
Becky
Posts.Title: OK Time for a very deep breath.......

Posts.Content: I know many of you have already been praying this week for the victims and families of the massacre that took place near us Monday.  Our governor has declared tomorrow a day of mourning in our state, and I think many of you would want to join us as we pray for those who have lost so many precious lives this week as well as those who must heal from their wounds.  These were not just Virginians -- they were from many states and, beyond that, they were someone's loved ones.
Posts.Title: Pray for VA Tech
HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO ELLEN!!

Posts.Content: Thank you, Jo-Ann. You two ladies enjoy your visit. Maybe you can find where Chuck is hiding the John Deere.
Posts.Title: The draft copy has been sent............
Talked to the nurse....
Hey Ladies, I know it seems that I only come around when I need you...

Posts.Content:
Lauri, what a sweet wish.  As time goes on and we're not actively involved in tx, our minds are not so totally involved in thinking about
 bc.  I guess we never will get away from wondering if/when it will return.  We just focus on going forward with our lives and seeking to do God's will.  I do pray for those still in this fight, especially for one who is dear to my heart.  Anyway, I know you are a happy grandmother.  What a treat it was to see baby Rose in KY, and now she's a big sister!  You are so blessed.
Posts.Title: Happy Birthday Beck2000... the best thing about January...

Posts.Content:
Happy Birthday, Cathi!  I am wishing that it's been a wonderful day for you and can't wait to hear about
 this new kitten.  What is his/her name?  Hope you two are snuggling and keeping warm.  All of that chocolate sure does sound good.  Blow out the candles and make a special wish.
Posts.Title: Happy Birthday Cathi!

Posts.Content:
Hey, Cathi. I want to thank you for this 
openly honest look at how you are doing. We've all been touched by cancer and know that it can get ugly. I'm so sorry you've had such bad pain. May this treatment help and ease that pain for you, dear friend. 
I know that I cannot get through a day without the Lord, Cath, and pray that He will comfort you and help you as you enter this new yet continued fight. 
Now, little Auti sounds like a winner! What a sweetheart who will love spending time with you. You'll know she's there by the loud purring.
I love you and admire you for being such a fighter. Remember we're here to discuss the tests, treatment, whatever --but, we're always here to distract you, too. You and Libby can always discuss the Grinch!
Love and Hugs,
Becky
Posts.Title: Here we go again...and again....
Happy Birthday, Libby!
OK, I am trying not to freak out here..........

Posts.Content: Happy Birthday, Mary K.  You've been a dear friend to us all, and now it's time for us to tell you how very much we love and appreciate you.  I sure hope you're getting some good sleep every night now.  You'll soon be feeling like a new woman!
Posts.Title: Happy Birthday, MaryK.............

Posts.Content: Luci, I miss you, too.  Happy Birthday, my friend.  "Treat" yourself to all of the things you love most on this special day.
Posts.Title: Happy birthday, Luci

Posts.Content:
Gail, this was great warm fuzzy to start our day. What's more beautiful than seeing a loving family welcoming a new baby. And he's so beautiful! I loved your website, and I'm so very happy for you all. 
L & H,
Becky
Posts.Title: Pictures!

Posts.Content:
OK, I'm late, too, but still wishing you the best for the coming year, Lori. Happy Belated Birthday! You know that you're allowed to just keep on celebrating.
You've had such a big year. I'm so happy for you and your new husband (and Tavish). 
Wedding cake followed by birthday cake -- yum!
L & H,
Becky
Posts.Title: Happy Birthday LoriG...TAVISH.......
checking in

Posts.Content: Tracy, it's so good to see you here.  I have no advice for you, hon, just a big hug and smile.  From your post, we can see why you haven't been here sooner!
Posts.Title: thanks for the invite, Lori, I'll introduce myself...

Posts.Content:
Hmm -- a pink quilt for a landing pad cushioned by a pink marshmallow caftan! How about
 adding layers of pink cotton candy to cushion us (not that Joyce isn't an excellent pilot!). That way we can always pull out a little of the fluffy stuff if we need a snack. 
I love you, Cathleen, and am praying for you. Tell your surgeon he needs to scrub up in pink!
Becky
Posts.Title: PCE already fueled for Cathi!
Rachel is doing well ~~I need surgery on my arm again..sigh

Posts.Content:
Cathi, this news has taken my breath away.  I am so very sorry to hear about
 Rachel.  It sounds like her dr is on top of things, and she has a mother who loves her dearly and will see her through this.  You know that I will be praying for both of you and that I hold you close in my heart.
Posts.Title: My daughter has cancer.......

Posts.Content: Geo & I are wishing the Lemon Lady a Happy Birthday and sending you big hugs for a great year ahead.  How wonderful that you have a good man like Vic to share that year with.  Give him a hug for us, too.
Posts.Title: Happy Birthday to our Captain Lemon !!...(Joyce)

Posts.Content: Joyce, please tell Cathi that we're so glad to hear such positive news!  Hopefully the drs will get that fever under control soon.  Give our dear friend a gentle hug and tell her she continues in my prayers.
Posts.Title: Cathi update!

Posts.Content: Annette, I remember when the gathering was and seeing the pictures.  At the time, I was undergoing treatment and Cincy seemed so far away to this rural VA girl.  Who would have believed that we would later hop in the car and travel to Myrtle Beach twice, Louisville, and even Cincinatti to get hugs from breast friends!  Those are some of my most cherished memories.
Posts.Title: Remember the first gathering in Cinti when I brought my baby

Posts.Content:
Joining the Happy Dancin' in VA! MK, I can just feel your relief and am so happy for your family.
Love ya,
Becky
Posts.Title: Happy Dancing in TX, the bone tumor is B-9!

Posts.Content:
Vicky, I'm sorry you're having such a time with your tx. We do miss seeing you on the board, but we certainly understand that you need to take care of you. Just know that we love hearing from you when you're up to it.
L & H,
Becky
Posts.Title: Hi There, checking in

Posts.Content: Lauri, I still picture Melanie Rose as a baby -- and now she's the big sister!  Wow!  You will all be blessed by those two little ones.  Congratulations on Luke Michael!
Posts.Title: Grandson's name is Luke Michael

Posts.Content: Luci, may God bless this sweet babe and comfort his family.  I'll be praying for all of you.
Posts.Title: New GS in hospital....
New Granddaughter!

Posts.Content:
Sorry I missed this the first time around, Luci. What special news! Even though we can't see his picture, I'm sure he's quite a handsome grandson. Please give this little blessing of yours a kiss from me.
Love,
Becky
Posts.Title: Now this is really good news.....

Posts.Content:
Oh, Gail, how wonderful! What a blessing for all of you. She deserves to be 'ditsy!" 
Here's a big hug for Grandma. {{{Gail}}}
L & H,
Becky
Posts.Title: GONNA BE A GRANDMA AGAIN!!!!!!
Mom is temporarily in a nursing home and I am having pre-cancer surgery

Posts.Content:
Cathi, I understand the many emotions you go through on your anniversary. I pray that the Lord will ease your pain and help you through this new chemo. How wonderful that you are having this trip! It sounds like the perfect way to celebrate your anniversary. 
I am so thankful to know you, my dear Cathleen, and look forward to celebrating many more anniversaries with you.
Love ya!
Becky
Posts.Title: My 6 year anniversary was on February 14th...but.....

Posts.Content:
Thank you, Joyce and MK, for ordering the flowers for us. It's such a sad time when we have to do this, but I'm sure the family appreciates having flowers from the board that means so much to each of us.
I'm mailing a check today.
Love,
Becky
Posts.Title: I ordered the flowers!
Happy Birthday Becky!

Posts.Content:
Hey, Lori!  Hope you're still celebrating this special birthday.  Can't wait to hear about
 your move and getting ready for the wedding.
Posts.Title: Happy belated Birthday LoriG...Tavish !!!

Posts.Content: Ah, Cathleen, my dear, sweet friend.  How I wish I could take this from you.
Posts.Title: Here we go AGAIN......Grrrrrrrrr
Happy, Happy Birthday Cathi.............

Posts.Content: OK, here's a big hug for you Ms Di.  Boy, your post made me feel like we need some in-person hugs soon!  I hope we can have a gathering before another year passes.
Posts.Title: Health failing and possible new cancer question ??????????

Posts.Content:
Oh, Cathi. I'm so sorry. Can't help crying at the thought of your having to say bye to Cody. What a dear companion you had. Our pets are not just animals but members of our families. I know you're going to miss this member of your family.
{{{Cathi}}}
Much love,
Becky
Posts.Title: I am so sad..I had to put my cat Cody to sleep this morning.....

Posts.Content: Woo Hoo, Bev!  Good news is always welcome!!  I had just read an e-mail from my youngest sister that her mammo had good results, then came on the board to read this from my SIL.  I am thanking God tonight.
Posts.Title: pork chop bone remains the diagnosis...
If you are riding the PCE to Bismarck ND tomorrow
Mary K, what a gorgeous day for a birthday!!

Posts.Content: Tru, how nice to see you!  Happy Birthday a little late; but you're right, October is a great month to celebrate.  Sure beats my birthday month of January -- yuck!
Posts.Title: Mary K, what a gorgeous day for a birthday!!
Happy Birthday Luci !!

Posts.Content: Happy Birthday, dear friend.  I have a vision of a huge chocolate cake smothered in caramel!  Oh, yes, and don't forget the ice cream!  Well, what I'd love to know is what you wished for as you blew out the candles.  Whatever it was, just know that I wish only the best for you as you begin a new year.  May it be filled with love and happiness.
Posts.Title: BIRTHDDAY GREETINGS!
Checking in...

Posts.Content: Is there a drum in the house?  We need to celebrate the birthday of Miss Lemonz.  Happy Birthday, Joyce!
Posts.Title: We need a drum for lemonz' birthday!

Posts.Content:
Bev, there's no place like home! I'm sure you're busy unpacking and making that new house your home. Would love to see it. More importantly, would love to see you!
L&H,
Becky & George
Posts.Title: big move is finally happening tomorrow...

Posts.Content:
Now, Annette, we all know how much you love AZ; but, honey, 110 degrees is hot! lol 
Keep dreaming about
 your upcoming trip. Seeing the desert again will be your wish come true. 
For today, enjoy that beautiful family of yours and share the cake!
Love and hugs,
Becky
Posts.Title: Happy Birthday, Annette (desertdreaming)

Posts.Content:
Hey, Arlene! So good to see you! Of course we remember you. I was angell0127 on the other board. 
Welcome home.
Becky
Posts.Title: MK or JoAnn

Posts.Content: Jo-Ann, Stefanie is right.  You are a gift to this group of women who have been brought together under what we thought were the worst circumstances possible.  Thank you not only for your medical knowledge, but also for the gifts of writing that we treasure.  You can make us cry and laugh at the same time!
Posts.Title: Happy Birthday to Jo-Ann!!!!

Posts.Content:
Well, Happy Birthday, Lauri! So sorry I missed it, but glad to join in a belated celebration. Maybe I'm still tired from reading your travelogue -- lol.
Continue the celebration throughout the year.
Hugs,
Becky
P.S. You didn't mention cake and ice cream!
Posts.Title: Lauri, did we miss something?

Posts.Content:
Cathi, you made me smile. I am so very happy that you and Luci had this special weekend together. Lunch with Libby had to have been a highlight of the weekend! Thank you so much for calling. I was more than happy to pull off the road driving home from Walton's Mountain to talk to my very dear friends. Yes, I was green -- but it was such a treat hearing your voices!
I love you!
Becky
Posts.Title: Spent the weekend with Luci and we had lunch with Libby !

Posts.Content:
Annette, just the picture of our baby Jordan growing into a first grade young girl is quite an illustration of how long our group has been together -- and still growing! You're allowed a tear her first day of school. Just think of the adventures she'll have to tell you about
 at the end of the day.
And as for your grand adventure, have an absolutely wonderful trip to AZ. You shared your love of AZ with another of our board members. Go soak in all the desert you can.
L&H,
Becky
Posts.Title: Jordan turned SIX this past Friday......

Posts.Content:
This heat has about
 gotten me down, too. Thank goodness for air conditioning!
Glad you've been in touch, Luci. We love you and Cathi both.
Becky
Posts.Title: Spoke to Cathi yesterday....

Posts.Content:
Frayda, people would think we were crazy for being happy for TB! But, I am so very happy for you. Great news! Enjoy your trip to Boston.
Hugs,
Becky
Posts.Title: Bronchoscopy update.....

Posts.Content: Congratulations, Lauri!  Tell Sarah that she gave us smiles to end our week.  Can you imagine Rose as a big sister?  I'm so happy for you all.
Posts.Title: Going to be a grandma again!!

Posts.Content: Thank you, Patty, for posting; and thank you, MK, for sharing the obituary.  I never met Janice in person, but I am struck by her beautiful smile.  Her family and friends must have been blessed to have shared her life, and we will miss seeing her on the board.
Posts.Title: bad news re JanWa (aka jebarnhart)

Posts.Content: Hooray, Lori!  Just keep on marking those milestones, girl.  We're right here with you.  I picked up my last tamoxifen refill today and go to the onc on Monday.  I'm hoping I graduate to annual visits then.
Posts.Title: "See ya next year," said the oncologist.....

Posts.Content:
Gee, Jo-Ann, your teenytinytown reminds me of the line in "Wizard of OZ" -- "Lions, and tiger, and bears -- oh, my!"
Now, you can battle the ants, but please don't go huntin' fer gater!
Keep the stories coming. We love them!
L&H,
Becky
Posts.Title: Playing catchup on teenytinytown

Posts.Content:
Oh, Mikki! Thank you so much for sharing. I loved seeing the pictures and thought the b&w ones were especially gorgeous.
You must be looking forward to being settled in your new home. Wish we could come for a house warming!
Take care of you.
Love,
Becky
Posts.Title: Thanks for the birthday wishes!

Posts.Content:
Luci, have a safe and fun-filled trip home. So glad you're having wonderful adventures. I can't wait to see the pictures. A little birdie told us that you were beautiful.
One of our teachers had just arrived in London early this morning. We were relieved to hear from her mother that they were well.
Will be watching for travel updates.
Love,
Becky
Posts.Title: On the road again....
Happy Happy Birthday nurse_mikki!

Posts.Content:
Happy Birthday, Debbie! I'm sure you spent it surrounded by that beautiful family of yours -- the absolute best way to celebrate! Well, your family here wants to share our love with you, too. 20 years -- amazing. God has really blessed you.
Love and hugs,
Becky
Posts.Title: Happy Birthday Deb (cupycake)

Posts.Content: Oh, Cathi!  I hope you can imagine how happy you have made all of us!!

Posts.Content:

What a great reason to eat cake and ice cream!

Hugs,
Becky
Posts.Title: HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO RITA FROM DENISE!!!!!!

Posts.Content:
Sure sounds like our friend Arthur I. Tis to me. He's made himself welcome in me!

Posts.Content:
Sara, don't ever say you don't write well! You've brought tears to my eyes. 
Thank you for sharing the day. I feel like we were there with you.
You created a beautiful image.
L&H,
Becky

Posts.Content: Beautiful, Di. Thank you.

Posts.Content:
Thank you for the post, Luci. We have been very concerned for our dear friend. I'm praying that her dr will know what tx is best for our Cathi and will echo your request that she may have peace in body and spirit.
Love and Hugs to you both,
Becky
Posts.Title: Cathi is in the hospital....

Posts.Content:
How good to see you post, Cyndy! Thanks so much for the update. Here's a prayer that the chemo keeps doing its job.

Posts.Title: checking in

Posts.Content: Ah, Beverly.  My dear sil, you have our prayers and love.  There's nothing like a little stress, huh?  Just watch for pink feathers to come floating in -- we'll all be there with you.  The PCE is the ONLY way I fly!
Posts.Title: Next step: Bone biopsy

Posts.Content:
Congratulations on your special day, Deb.
L&H,
Becky
Posts.Title: 20 years for Cupycake!!!!

Posts.Content:
Oh, Mary K. Don't you love the waiting until you can have more images taken! Those little nagging questions will always be there for us; that's part of our "new normal." 
We'll get Joyce to fire up the PCE for Monday. That may be the only way I'll ever see Texas!
Sending loving hugs,
Becky
Posts.Title: Diagnostic mammograhy ordered

Posts.Content:
My dear, sweet Cathleen. I love you. 
Becky
Posts.Title: Chemo protocol...Xeloda questions....

Posts.Content:
Prayers for our Connie. Thank you so much for calling, Joyce, and letting us know.
Hugs,
Becky
Posts.Title: Connie is in the hospital!
Prayers please

Posts.Content:
Angela, we understand the frustration. We've all "been there, done that." Honey, you're a great friend. Please give Becky a gentle hug when you are able to see her. 
Hugs,
Becky
Posts.Title: Continued Prayers for Becky...
About Connie

Posts.Content:
Welcome, Laure, from a fellow Virginian. Sorry to hear you're leaving the Commonwealth to move to NJ, but you'll be near a very dear friend of mine, Libby. 
You've found a community of women who have been through a lot together as well as some newer members who are contributing info as well. Just let us know what your concerns are, and someone will surely have a response!
We hope your visit is a short one once you hear the "benign" word. Just know, that there is help here if you need it.
Welcoming hugs,
Becky
Posts.Title: Having core biopsy on Friday - very scared

Posts.Content:
Hope you get pain meds soon, Jackie. I remember those taxol pains -- OUCH!!
Hope Abraxane works its magic for both you and Shelley.
L&H,
Becky
Posts.Title: Abraxane side effect -- OMG, I forgot about the bone pain!

Posts.Content:
{{{Cathi}}} What a day is right! So glad the sugar level is coming down. Will be praying as you go through the week that the side effects from the chemo will not be bad. You're a strong woman, my friend, and beneath our pink feathers you will find a lot of support from your breast friends.
Love you,
Becky
Posts.Title: What a day......

Posts.Content:
My mom and I have our onc appts tomorrow, Valentine's Day. Praying that all will be uneventful. 
Lori, it's hard to believe we're getting near the end of our 5 years of tamoxifen! 
L&H,
Becky
Posts.Title: This week Feb 13th - 19th

Posts.Content:
Ellen, I'm so glad you're getting the cough checked out. I sure can understand why you'd be reluctant to get your hopes up again; but with that opportunity presenting itself, we'll be here surrounding you and full of hope for you. 
L&H,
Becky
Posts.Title: ct scan, other stuff coming up

Posts.Content:
Shelley is in my prayers, Joyce. I'm so sorry to hear that she's back in the hospital.
Here's a hug for you, too, my friend.
L&H,
Becky
Posts.Title: Shelley is back in the hospital!

Posts.Content:
Happy Birthday, Becky! May your special day be filled with love and doing whatever makes you happy. Now if that includes eating cake, we'd love to help you out!
L&H,
Becky
Posts.Title: Happy Birthday to "MightyBecky"...............

Posts.Content:
Here's a big hug for our Connie. We've missed you, dear friend. You are in our thoughts and prayers. May you soon be feeling better and having more energy.
L&H,
Becky
Posts.Title: Any word from Connie?

Posts.Content:
I'll be praying for you and your mom, Sara. There is no one like our Mama, is there? As soon as Captain Lemonz clears us to board, I'll be joining your other breast friends on the PCE.
Love,
Becky
Posts.Title: Prayers Please

Posts.Content: Congratulations, Dr. Ellen!  This is huge, lady!  Your hard work has paid off.  Applause!  Applause!
Posts.Title: Please leave a message of congratulations to Dr. Ellen

Posts.Content: Happy Anniversary to us all!  I'm so glad to be celebrating with some wonderful ladies.  I think I still see Carole2of5 still around.
Posts.Title: "freshman class" of 2000 reunion......

Posts.Content:
Ah, Shells, so sorry to hear about the fluid. Hope it drains quickly and you're back home soon. Just cannot imagine you looking like Frankenstein!
Here's a special hug for you -- you can share it with Kalia.
L&H,
Becky
Posts.Title: Having surgery, again!

Posts.Content:
{{{Cathi}}} You are such a dear friend. We've traveled quite a road in 5 years, and your friends are certainly going to be there with you for the next chemo. We have shared a lot -- the best thing being love.
Can you pack some of us with you to take to FL? lol
I love you!
Becky
Posts.Title: 5 years ago today I was told I had Breast Cancer..........

Posts.Content:
Sorry you had an ugly spot, Bev. Hope it turns out to be nothing more than just plain ugly! That ugly spot sure picked a beautiful gal to attach to. So glad your hubby stood up for his wife. What a guy!
We're waiting for the results with you, hon.
Love,
Becky
Posts.Title: re: my "ugly spot"

Posts.Content:
Thank you, dear friends. There's nothing like having bc to make you appreciate each and every birthday that follows. Each one of you is a blessing in my life.
Now, MK -- That sounds like some serious ice cream! Wonder if you can e-mail me some of that? It sounds heavenly! I love you, Lib, but I think MK's ice cream beats the sherbert. 
Since we can't have a breast friends gathering in January, it's great to have a trio birthday party on the board! Thank you all.
Love,
Becky
Posts.Title: Happy Birthday to Becky2000.......

Posts.Content:
Happy Birthday, Stef! Gee, this will make my 3rd piece of birthday cake today -- it's a good thing birthday cake doesn't have any calories!
So thankful to be celebrating your 38th birthday with you. Wonder why MK didn't ask if it was my 38th? LOL 
It sounds like you have your priorities straight with your loving family. Have a nice birthday dance to some slow Alan Jackson song.
L&H,
Becky
Posts.Title: Happy Birthday Stepahnie, Wackygal

Posts.Content:
Oh, dear. This is not the news we wanted to hear, Angela, but I'm so thankful that you are there for Becky. We will be praying for both of you. Give each other a hug and feel us surrounding you with love.
Thank you for letting us know, Angela. You're a great friend.
L&H,
Becky
Posts.Title: Continued Prayers for Becky...

Posts.Content:
Happy Birthday, Kitty! We sure picked a cold month to be born, didn't we? That's ok -- we can warm our hands by the fire from all of our birthday candles! lol
Have a special day with your family.
L&H,
Becky
Posts.Title: Birthday wishes for Kitty, too....m

Posts.Content: Welcome home, Luci -- or should I call you "Take Charge, Luci?"  Just consider this another stage in your teaching career.  I can just imagine the techs going, "Well, duh" when you mentioned using one of your legs!
Posts.Title: Hellooo, I'm home....

Posts.Content:
Shelley, it's so good to see you posting again. I'm so glad you were able to come home and have a wonderful Christmas with your loved ones. Little Kalia must have had a grand time. 
I've had trouble getting the "Error" message when trying to get into HW, too. Sometimes I've been able to get in going the "long" way instead of using my Favorites.
Take care, my friend. We love hearing from you!
Becky
Posts.Title: Testing, testing!
It's been 5 years for me

Posts.Content:
Yikes, Jo-Ann! And here I thought going 65 was fast!!
Annette, we're celebrating this 5-year anniversary with you, hon. Since we're graduates of the BC School of Hard Knocks, we'll always be more aware of our mortality than some others. While aches and pains make us wonder "what if?", we have also earned a greater appreciation of the little things in life. 
My greatest Christmas memories for this year were made by our children's reactions to their presents -- surprise and delight! Those are memories I will treasure.
Here's an extra hug for you, Miss Annette. Happy Anniversary!
Love,
Becky

AgeInfo.Phrase:
And here I thought going 65 was fast  
Annette  we're celebrating

Posts.Title: Really though that it would be different this year...(m)

Posts.Content:
So glad to hear that Deb is home and everything is going well. Deb, take care of yourself and heal. 
Love,
Becky
Posts.Title: I just spoke with Debbie (cupycake)....

Posts.Content:
Hey, sweet Luci. It's so good to see you posting. I'm hoping all of these hugs from your friends are giving you warm, fuzzies. 
We're with you, dear friend, as you go through these tests and wait for the results. Can't you just hear JoAnnie shouting, "Pork Chop Bone!"? 
I love you, hon, and am so thankful your dr is being so thorough. Bear with him, and we'll pray that good results will be on the way soon.
Becky
Posts.Title: I need help, my friends...
HIT MY 5 YEARS! READY TO MOVE FROM TAM. TO LETROZOLE BUT NOT IN MENOPAUSE !

Posts.Content:
The PCE is the only way to fly! Sara, hang on to these good wishes for you and your mom. We're there with you, hon. 
Mom, you have a great gal. Hope you are back on your feet quick as a wink!
Hugs and Prayers,
Becky
Posts.Title: PCE loading for Saras Mom

Posts.Content: Hey, Lori!  We're celebrating with you on this special anniversary!  There are quite a few of us getting ready to hit that five year mark -- and very thankful to still be here.
Posts.Title: 5 year anniversary tomorrow!!!
Mel's funeral

Posts.Content:
Happy Birthday, Julie! What a special way to spend your day with your dd Hannah. 
Each day does seem sweeter and more special since dx. You're right about focusing on the really important things.
L&H,
Becky
Posts.Title: Turned 35 today.....

Posts.Content: Hey, sweet girl!  It's so good to see you here.  Your brother would love to see you again!
Posts.Title: Popping in to say "Hi."

Posts.Content:
So glad you received such a wonderful birthday present! I think that entitles you to celebrate the whole coming year.
Happy Birthday,
Becky
Posts.Title: Thank you for remembering, Cathi...

Posts.Content: You are so right, my dear friend.  There's not a one of us who does not remember that moment.  Once I heard that awful word "malignant", I felt like someone had hit me in the pit of my stomach and could not breathe.  Thank goodness, George was with me.  We went immediately to my pcp's office, and she arranged for me to see a surgeon that afternoon.  This was a Friday; surgery was scheduled for the following Wednesday.  I wanted that thing out of me!
Posts.Title: You never forget that call....

Posts.Content:
Oh, Becky, I just love cuddling time. So glad you were able to spend time with your family and loved hearing about the party. 
DH sounds like a special guy; give him a hug for me.
You're right -- God is good!
Love,
Becky
Posts.Title: Have to share with you the best day----

Posts.Content: Becky, 55, Virginia -- DX 01/07/2000, Lump, ER/PR +, Chemo, Rads, Tamoxifen.
Posts.Title: ROLL CALL name, age, state and any other info to share

Posts.Content:
Luci, what a trooper you are! I'm so proud to know you.
Three cheers for no tumor, and we'll just take a breath and get that 2nd opinion before looking at an operating room, thank you. What a gal!
Love you!
Becky
